item.title: Hurricane EXERCISE Forecast/Advisory Number 10
item.description:
Issued at 2100Z SAT MAY 16 2015 
ZCZC MIATCMAT2 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE EXERCISE FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   10
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL892015
2100 UTC SAT MAY 16 2015
 
TROPICAL DEPRESSION CENTER LOCATED NEAR 18.5N  83.8W AT 16/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 945 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  105 KT WITH GUSTS TO  125 KT.
64 KT...  20NE  30SE  20SW  15NW.
50 KT...  65NE  90SE  65SW  45NW.
34 KT... 140NE 180SE 135SW 120NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 18.5N  83.8W AT 16/2100Z
AT 16/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 18.5N  83.8W
 
FORECAST VALID 17/0600Z 19.0N  84.7W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS  145 KT.
64 KT...  30NE  40SE  30SW  20NW.
50 KT...  75NE 100SE  75SW  50NW.
34 KT... 150NE 200SE 135SW 120NW.

MAX WIND  125 KT...GUSTS  150 KT.
64 KT...  60NE  60SE  40SW  50NW.
50 KT...  80NE 100SE  75SW  60NW.
34 KT... 150NE 200SE 150SW 120NW.

MAX WIND  105 KT...GUSTS  125 KT.
64 KT...  75NE  60SE  50SW  60NW.
50 KT... 100NE  90SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT... 175NE 200SE 150SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 18/1800Z 22.2N  88.2W
MAX WIND  115 KT...GUSTS  135 KT.
64 KT...  75NE  60SE  50SW  60NW.
50 KT... 110NE  90SE  85SW 100NW.
34 KT... 180NE 180SE 150SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 19/1800Z 25.1N  91.0W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
64 KT...  90NE  70SE  60SW  80NW.
50 KT... 120NE 120SE  90SW 100NW.
34 KT... 200NE 200SE 160SW 190NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 250 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 325 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 20/1800Z 29.7N  91.8W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS  145 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 21/1800Z 33.0N  90.5W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 23.2N  75.5W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 17/0300Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
